title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2506 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2506 - Enforcement

State Regulations
§ 2506.1 - Determination of legal regulated rents; penalties; fines; assessment of costs; attorney's fees; rent credits; where the proceeding is commenced prior to June 14, 2019
§ 2506.2 - Orders to enforce the act and this Chapter
§ 2506.3 - Injunctions by Supreme Court
§ 2506.4 - Oaths, subpoenas, hearing officers
§ 2506.5 - Confidentiality of information
§ 2506.6 - Inspection and records
§ 2506.7 - Intervention
§ 2506.8 - Determination of legal regulated rents; penalties; fines; assessment of costs; attorney's fees; rent credits; where the proceeding is commenced on or after June 14, 2019

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2506

Statutory authority: L. 1974, ch. 576; L. 1983, ch. 403

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
